author: joes
msg: Major improvements to the apreq_parser API and mod_apreq filter.
Structural changes to the core:
APREQ_ENV is gone.
struct apreq_hook_t added (similar API to httpd's filter stack),
struct apreq_parser_t simplified,
struct apreq_request_t modified to hold config data (as in libapreq-1).
"passive-aggressive" parsing code added to apreq_param() (similar
to libapreq-1, but slightly less agressive :-).
Feature additions to mod_apreq.c:
Filter supports prefetch reads.
Filter should DTRT for subrequests & internal redirects.
Also cleaned up libapreq_cgi.c a little bit.

author: nd
msg: propose a backport.

author: nd
msg: Use generic whitespace character class when parsing
"require" directives, instead of literal spaces only.

author: nd
msg: general mod_proxy docs cleanup:
- add documentation for ProxyIOBufferSize (review desired)
- fix context lists of ProxyPass and ProxyPassReverse
- add more notes about the accompanying modules (_http, _ftp, _connect)
- markup & reformatting (sorry for the big diff)
-> update transformation
